message: WebGL (3D canvas), IndexedDB, Navigation Timing API and Crypto API, faster WebView, onscroll events, Fullscreen API, CSS Shapes, partial ES6 support, srcset support, SPDY support and a lot more!
story: Ahmad Alfy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: iOS 8 and iPhone 6 for web developers and designers: next evolution for Safari and native...
caption: mobilexweb.com
description: iOS 8 is finally here while the new iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 plus will appear in a few days. New APIs appears on scene, as well as new challenges to support the new screen sizes. Iâ€™ve been playing with the final version and here you have my findings.
